news_header: Newmont is selling its Porcupine operation in Ontario to Discovery Silver for $425 million as part of its divestiture program.
news_text: Newmont announced the final phase of its divestiture program by agreeing to sell its Porcupine operation in Ontario to Discovery Silver for a total of $425 million. The deal includes $200 million in cash at closing, $75 million in Discovery Silver shares, and $150 million in deferred cash payments. The sale is expected to close in the first half of 2025, pending regulatory approvals. This divestiture marks Newmont's strategic shift to focus on Tier 1 assets, with the company anticipating up to $4.3 billion in gross proceeds from its overall divestiture program launched in February 2024.
